tweet_text: @perdricof @Nymphomachy It's why the Hells in particular (as opposed to the Abyss) are *navigable*, to some degree, at least with a thoughtful GM, even for non-evil characters; everybody follows Rules there, because the folks there truly believe in them. Shitty ideals make shitty worlds.
